page.title: 16SOCIAL CONCERN - TRANSPORT
page.content: ANOTHER LOCAL ISSUE WHICH WAS A CAUSE FOR SOCIAL CONCERN WAS THE SPARSITY AND INFREQUENCY OF PUBLIC TRANSPORT.THIS WAS AN ISSUE WHICH PARTICULARLY AFFECTED THE YOUNG AND THE ELDERLY. MANY TEENAGERS HAD DIFFICULTY IN GETTING TO THEIR COLLEGES IN GUILDFORD AND FARNHAM. RESIDENTS ALSO EXPRESSED CONCERN OVER THE NOISE, DUST AND VIBRATION CAUSED BY THE HUGE LORRIES WHICH SPEED THROUGH THE AREA CARRYING HARDCORE TO INFILL A LOCAL QUARRY. THEY FELT THAT THE ROADS WERE UNSUITED TO CARRYING SUCH HEAVY LORRIES AND THAT THEY WERE PRIMARILY RESPONSIBLE FOR THE DETERIORATION IN THE QUALITY OF THE ROAD SURFACES.
